baseUrl.description: Base URL of website where output content will be accessible from.

defaultGeneratorName.description: Name of the generator that should be used to generate output content when not specified by the associated resource type.

defaultModeName.description: Name of the mode that should be used to read and write resource files when not specified by the associated resource type.

hiddenUrlExtensions.description: File extensions that should be hidden from URLs.

hiddenUrlFileNames.description: File names that should be hidden from generated URLs.

paths.description: Customize output paths. Paths are resolved relative from the project's root path.

resourceTypes.description: Map defining the resource types that are used in the project.

plugins.description:
List of webreed plugin packages.

Plugins are used in the order given; although load order is not normally important.

package.description: Name of the package that contains the plugin.

options.description: Options that are provided to plugin package setup function.

pluginContext.description: References a plugin by its name and can optionally specify options that apply in this context.

options.description: Options that apply for this context of the plugin.

conversions.description: Map of conversion transformers from the resource type to zero-or-more target extensions.

custom.description: A general purpose container of custom properties that can be used by plugins.

encoding.description: Encoding of the resource; used by 'text' mode.

parseFrontmatter.description: Indicates whether frontmatter of source content should be parsed when reading resources of this type.

targetExtension.description:
Target extension type that should be implied when processing resources of this type. For instance, it could be implied that markdown files are always saved as .html files.

Specify `null` or omit this property when no target extension should be implied.

mode.description: Identifies the mode that will be used to read and write resources of this type.

handler.description: Identifies the handler that is used to decode or encode data in the body of resources of this type. This is useful for data formats such as JSON and YAML.

generator.description: Identifies the generator that is used to process resources of this type.

process.description: Identifies zero-or-more transformers which are in-turn applied to resources of this type.

templateEngine.description: Identifies the template engine that is used to render resources of this type. This is applicable when using the 'template' process transformation.

template.description: Name of a template to apply by default to resources of this type.

transformerPluginContext.description: References a transformer plugin by its key and can optionally specify options that apply in this context.

options.description: Options that are provided to plugin package setup function.
